pages.text: Upgrade augments improve the overall stats of machines, devices, dynamos, and tools; they scale the base RF storage/transfer, fluid storage/transfer, and RF/t usage/generation. This overall scale factor stacks with other augment modifiers, even if they are underlined. However, as with all other underlined modifiers, only the highest scale factor modifier applies.

For example, a $(l:thermal:technology/machines/furnace)Redstone Furnace$(/l) with Resonant and Hardened Integral Components and a $(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil_storage)Stabilized RF Coil$(/l) will have 24x the RF storage, 8x RF transfer, and 4x base RF/t.$(br2)Hardened, Reinforced, and Resonant Integral Components have scale factors of 2x, 3x, and 4x respectively.
